name: Easy Choclate Cake
desc: A simple recipe that will become a staple in your home for all birthdays and celebrations! This chocolate cake is 100% vegan and still beats most of its competitors that use milk and eggs. This deliciously dense and rich cake calls for some interesting ingredients that you wouldn't normally find in a cake, like apple cider vinegar, but trust me, it's a cake you don't want to miss out on. You can use any kind of icing but I recommend trying this cake with a homemade vanilla or cream cheese frosting.
prev: A very ense and rich chocolate cake.
steps: Preheat oven to 350° F
In a large bowl, whisk together all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Whisk in coffee, vegetable oil and vanilla. Stir in apple cider vinegar.

Line cake pan with cooking spray. Pour batter into pan and bake at 350°. For one 9 x 13 inch pan, bake for 30-35 minutes. For two 8-9 inch round or square pans, bake for 20-25 minutes. For pan of 24 cupcakes, bake for 18-20 minutes. 20-35 minutes for
Bake in preheated oven for 6 to 8 minutes. Flip the sandwiches, and bake an additional 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown.
Once baked, remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes in pan. Then flip the cake onto rack and remove pan.

name: Banana Cake
desc: A simple recipe that will become a staple in your home for This chocolate cake is 100% vegan and is still beats most of it's competitors that use milk and eggs.
steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).

Butter one side of 9 slices of bread, and place butter-side down on a baking sheet. Arrange cheese on each slice of bread. Spread butter on 9 remaining slices of bread, and place them buttered-side up on top of the cheese.
Bake in preheated oven for 6 to 8 minutes. Flip the sandwiches, and bake an additional 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown.
Taken from: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/32089/awesome-grilled-cheese-sandwiches/

name: Mini Cheesecakes
body: This is the body of how to make apple pie
steps: To make crust, combine graham cracker crumbs, white sugar and melted butter.
With muffin liners in pan, firmly press the mixture into the button and bake at 325° F for 5 minutes.
Next, with mixer beat cream cheeese and sour cream together until smooth and creamy.
Add white sugar and vanilla
Mix in eggs, one at a time on low speed until just combined.
Pour mixture into pan over top of the graham cracker crust.
Bake at 325° F for 17-20 minutes.
Once baked, take out of oven and let the pan cool for 1 hour then put in fridge.
You will know they are done when they only jiggle slightly when you shake the pan.
Remove from pan and serve with fresh fruit or chocolate.

name: Banana Muffins
body: This is the body of how to make Big Mac
steps: In a bown mix dry ingredients, flour, baking soda, salt and natural bran.
In another bowl mix butter, sugar and  vanilla.
Mash 2 bananas
Add flour mixture and mashed banans together
Pour mixture into muffin tray and bake at 360° F for 20 minutes.
Once baked, remove from oven and top with brown sugar and cinnamon mixture (optional).
ing: 1 ½ cup flour (half all-purpose, half whole wheat)
2 tablespoons dill pickle slices, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Chocoalte Chip Cookies
desc: The only chocolate chip cookie recipe you will need
prev: The only cookie recipe you'll need.
body: This is the body of how to make Sushi
steps: Mix mayonnaise, chile sauce, togarashi, wasabi, chili powder, and paprika together in a bowl; fold in imitation crabmeat until evenly coated.
let mixture sit for 2 hours in fridge then bake at 350° F for 14 minutes.
Roll nori sheet around the crabmeat mixture filling, starting on the filling side until completely wrapped. Cut each roll into 8 equal pieces.
Taken from: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/241197/spicy-sushi-roll/
ing: 1 cup chocolate chips (milk or semi sweet)

name: Chicken Alfredo Casserole
desc: A nice play on chicken Alfredo
body: This is the body of how to make Sushi
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place chicken into a pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat; reduce heat and simmer until no longer pink in the centers and juices run clear, about 15 minutes.

At the same time, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes. Drain. Drain cooked chicken and cut into bite-size pieces.

Place chicken, noodles, Alfredo sauce, 1/2 mozzarella cheese, milk, onion powder, and garlic powder in a large bowl and mix well. Pour into a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Layer remaining mozzarella cheese and Cheddar cheese on top.
Bake in the preheated oven until melted and bubbly, about 25 minutes.
Taken from: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/276726/chicken-alfredo-casserole/
ing: 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided

name: BLT
body: This is the body of how to make Sushi
steps: Cook the bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain the bacon slices on a paper towel-lined plate.
Arrange the cooked bacon, lettuce, and tomato slices on one slice of bread. Spread one side of remaining bread slice with the mayonnaise. Bring the two pieces together to make a sandwich.
Taken from: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/209578/blt/

name: Chocolate Chunk Cookies
body: This is the body of how to make Sushi
steps: Combine brown sugar, butter, white sugar, and salt in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until a creamy, deep brown mixture forms. Add egg and vanilla; beat until mixture lightens and becomes smooth, 10 to 15 seconds.

Mix flour and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Add slowly to the wet ingredients until mostly incorporated, but some white traces of flour remain. Fold in milk chocolate, dark chocolate, and white chocolate using a spatula, not the mixer. Cover the dough and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 48 hours.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) when ready to bake.
Divide cold dough into 2 1/4-ounce portions and place on a cookie sheet.

Bake in the preheated oven until the edges start to look golden brown and crispy, 10 to 12 minutes. Do not overbake; the centers will not look fully done. Cool until cookies are set, about 30 minutes.
Taken from: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/278882/triple-chocolate-chunk-cookies/
ing: ½ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
1 (3 ounce) bar dark chocolate, cut into chunks

name: Mac and Cheese
body: This is the body of how to make Sushi
steps: Cook macaroni according to the package directions. Drain.

In a saucepan, melt butter or margarine over medium heat. Stir in enough flour to make a roux. Add milk to roux slowly, stirring constantly. Stir in cheeses, and cook over low heat until cheese is melted and the sauce is a little thick. Put macaroni in large casserole dish, and pour sauce over macaroni. Stir well.
Melt butter or margarine in a skillet over medium heat. Add breadcrumbs and brown. Spread over the macaroni and cheese to cover. Sprinkle with a little paprika.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 minutes. Serve.
Taken from: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/11679/homemade-mac-and-cheese/
